author: Julia Hartley-Brewer
title: Driving a Tube is easy and not worth £50,000 a year. Let's sack the lot of them
text: Road and rail transport Driving a Tube is easy and not worth £50,000 a year. Let's sack the lot of them Tube drivers have been taking the mickey out of Londoners for far too many years and it's time we called their bluff People wait for buses at King's Cross station, London, as commuters and tourists face a day of travel chaos because of a strike which has closed the undergroun Photo: PA
